General.Name: Samsung Engineering
General.Description: Samsung Engineering Co., Ltd. provides a range of engineering services worldwide. It operates in two segments, Hydrocarbon Business and Non-Hydrocarbon Business. The company offers feasibility study and financing, engineering, procurement, construction, commissioning, operation and maintenance, and project management services. It serves oil refineries, infra, steel, electricity generation, water treatment, and industrial facilities. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
